name: Guard The Door
description:
Your task is simple. Don't let the monsters living in the palace go outside . build a wall in front of them from the knights and prevent them from damaging the door. Be careful while doing these, if you don't use your gold carefully, you will have trouble in the future because things get a little hot in every wave.

W , A , S , D : Camera Movement

Mouse Whell UP/DOWN  : Camera Zoom

Left Mouse Click : Damage To Enemy

Right Mouse Click : Select / Deploy Selected Character
